executable.title: HoughTransform
executable.description: This module allows the detection of circular objects in images
executable.acknowledgements: This work was partially funded by CAPES and University of Sao Paulo.

integer.name: sliceBegin
integer.label: Slice Begin
integer.description: A integer value (in units of mm) passed to the algorithm

integer.name: sliceEnd
integer.label: Slice End
integer.description: A integer value (in units of mm) passed to the algorithm

integer.name: minimumRadius
integer.label: Minimum Radius
integer.description: A integer value (in units of mm) passed to the algorithm

integer.name: maximumRadius
integer.label: Maximum Radius
integer.description: A integer value (in units of mm) passed to the algorithm
